name: rabbithud
description: Rabbit HUD is an overlay system to display transparent browser windows on top

scripts.postinstall: cross-env ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE=1 electron scripts/update-electron-vendors.mjs && electron-builder install-app-deps
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer
scripts.compile: cross-env MODE=production npm run build && electron-builder build --config .electron-builder.config.js --dir --config.asar=false

author: Kura Bloodlust <me@kurabloodlust.eu>
